title: RD - Daily Wire Lawsuit, Rittenhouse Judge Dunks on CNN & Rust Sabotage Theory
itunes:title: RD - Daily Wire Lawsuit, Rittenhouse Judge Dunks on CNN & Rust Sabotage Theory
description:
Adam and Mark link up for an early Best Hour to discuss the breaking news that OSHA has set the date for the vaccine mandate and Mark reveals that a friend of the show is helping Daily Wire sue to try and stop it. They also discuss Kyle Rittenhouse Judge Bruce Schroeder pausing the trial to rant against the inaccuracies he sees reported on CNN, what charges await former Raiders WR Henry Ruggs and finally they close with some interesting comments out of the lawyer for 'Rust' armorer Hannah Gutierrez-Reed.

Watch this episode & subscribe on YouTube at YouTube.com/AdamCarolla

Please Support Our Sponsors:
ReliefBand.com - Promo code: Doubt
